alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Shelby; St. Clair (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 12 at 7:42PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN SHELBY...EAST CENTRAL JEFFERSON AND SOUTHWESTERN ST. CLAIR COUNTIES THROUGH 815 PM CDT... At 741 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northeastern Birmingham, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Birmingham, Vestavia Hills, Mountain Brook, Trussville, Gardendale, Irondale, Leeds, Moody, Fultondale, Center Point, Pinson, Tarrant, Westover, Ketona Lakes, B.j.c.c., Shops of Grand River, Kingston, Five Points South, Grayson Valley, and Vandiver. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
